climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 🌟【ERGONOMIC BACKREST】- The backrest of the office chair is curved to fully adapt to your spine, reduce hunchback, and correct your sitting posture. It also provides good lumbar support for long office hours, relieves fatigue, and reduces aches and pains.

🌟【HIGH-GRADE LEATHER】- The ergonomic office chair is made of high-grade upholstered leather and foam cushion, making it very comfortable to sit on. The silver shine of the base and handles, as well as the finish and texture of the leather material, make this chair look very upscale in your office. The upholstered seat cushion and padded armrests provide all-day comfort and support, making it ideal for the office or conference room.

🌟【MULTI-ADJUSTMENT】- This home office desk chair features a gas lift mechanism. You can adjust its height smoothly by pushing the lever located under the seat. This manager swivel chair can be adjusted for height and tilt, so you can get the most comfortable office entertainment and rest use according to your needs.

🌟【SAFETY GUARANTEE】- This big and tall office chair offers a heavy-duty durable nylon painted base that strictly meets BIFMA standards, a safe gas lift, and rolling nylon silent casters to protect the floor. Can support adults up to 300 lbs. The base is quite wide, giving you plenty of extra space.

🌟【QUICK INSTALLATION】- We are committed to bringing a great experience to all our customers. If you have any questions about the chair, please feel free to contact us. We will solve all the problems for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such an amazing price for this beautiful and comfortable chair. So easy to put together that I did it myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfort
reviews.reviewText: I needed a chair just like this, but was hesitant to assemble. however, the instructions were easy. The assembly was a bit difficult, mainly because for screwing in some of screws, it took a good amount of strength, and putting the back on was difficult for just me as I had to hold the back in place while trying to insert the screws. So, you may need a second person for that, but the chair is unbelievable comfortable and stylish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO EASY TO SET UP AND BEAUTIFUL
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time buying an office chair and i was nervous. I was worried that i wouldnt like it or it wasn't going to be the easiest to build...Thankfully it came in and the instructions were easy to understand! They were clear and the tools they provided were enough.As for the chair, its high quality! Its comfortable and it has a lot of room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great office chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a excellent office chair for the priceVery comfortable , quality built , excellentMaterials, very easy to assemble took 20 mins and directions very straight forward and in English. I’m very happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice comfortable and clean
reviews.reviewText: Very nice chair, easy to assemble, done in 10 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble and Very Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair for my wife's home office and she loves it. The chair is easy to assemble and it looks great. The faux leather material is supple, and the underneath padding is just right. The stitching and seams are perfectly aligned. The chair profile is low and it fits comfortably in small spaces, although the chair is standard size. My wife is 5'1" and I am 5'11". The height adjustment operates smoothly and easily and permits either of us to adjust the seat height to a comfortable level. For the money, you can't go wrong with this beautiful chair. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable, affordable
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I've had this chair for my home office for only about 10 days, so I can't attest to its durability. However, I purchased this chair for $64.99 and so far it's been great, super comfortable and very affordable relative to the other office chairs I reviewed. I spend 4 - 6 hours daily in this chair and the back pain is gone! The chair's arms are adjustable and so far I just love this purchase, particularly after reading some of the reviews for the other available office chairs, i.e. cheaply made, falling apart, defective, no return, etc. If you are dissatisfied with this chair you can also return it in the first 30 days, unlike so many others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this chair in box last week. It is hard for one person to put it together. My son helped me with putting the wheels on and the seat on the base. Otherwise I figured how to do the rest except for lining up the pre- drilled holes for the back and seat. I am 85 so I am not super strong!. The chair is very comfortable and quite attractive.
